# NSCollectionChangeType.remove

**Case**

A change type that represents the removal of an object from an ordered collection.

## Declaration

```swift
case remove
```

## Types of Ordered Collection Changes

- **NSCollectionChangeType.insert**: A change type that represents the insertion of an object into an ordered collection.

items.description: A change type that represents the insertion of an object into an ordered collection.
items.name: NSCollectionChangeType.insert
